programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A scientist (Nicolas Cage) and a British spy (Sean Connery) who once escaped from Alcatraz are sent to the former island prison to stop a disgruntled war hero (Ed Harris) from obliterating San Francisco with chemical warheads.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A successful preacher (Tim Daly) is the prime suspect in a murder case, until his wife (Kathy Baker) provides detectives with a taped conversation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The only witness to the beating of a woman (Judy Kuhn) is her daughter (Paulina Gerzon) who has Williams syndrome.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives discover a kidnapped girl in the trunk of a stolen rental car; the suspect's rage seriously injures Stabler; the trial forces Novak to face dark things in her past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an infant goes missing, members of the SVU find themselves taking sides in a family's right-to-die court case; Barba's interference in the case puts the entire DA's office in jeopardy.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.

programme.title: Live: 2025 AIG Women's Open
programme.desc: Watch the opening round of the AIG Women's Open at Royal Porthcawl Golf Club in Porthcawl, Wales.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a polygamist's wife is murdered, he fears his testimony in a separate case may have led to her death; a Web site exposes potential witnesses.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A wealthy teen is found murdered in New York's Central Park, and the clues lead to a gang of homeless children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a park alongside a man with a bullet in his head.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a teenage girl assaulted in the projects leads to a startling discovery; Benson puts her trust in someone from her past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro asks the SVU for help in clearing a convicted man's name and brings a figure from Benson's past back into her life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular fighter doesn't show up for the biggest bout of the year, Rollins and Velasco are drawn into a complicated web of secrets; McGrath confides in Benson.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi's niece helps a friend report a sexual assault; Benson investigates a college's secret society that preys on female students.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins investigates an assault by a masked man at an underground party; Benson uncovers a suspect who may be valuable as a witness.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A recently released convict goes looking for his arresting officer, Fin Tutuola; Carisi tries to get an arrest warrant without a positive suspect ID.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A construction tycoon interferes with an SVU investigation into her family; Carisi struggles to get an indictment when the complainant backs down.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi must tread carefully when Maxwell's husband becomes a person of interest in an SVU investigation; Benson sends Velasco to take an old friend into custody.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A nanny's Internet love interest (Steven Bauer) is the obvious suspect when she is found murdered, but detectives look more closely at her employers (Mark Valley, Anastasia Griffith) when skeletons are found in their closet.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a polygamist's wife is murdered, he fears his testimony in a separate case may have led to her death; a Web site exposes potential witnesses.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault; Fin makes sure Benson is protected at work.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A doctor arrested for sexually abusing his patients is set free after Cassidy's testimony causes a mistrial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl's tragic death becomes a criminal case when a surgeon harvests her organs without parental consent.
Athena and the 118 race to the rescue when a fading movie star is plagued by a series of near-death experiences.

programme.title: Live: 2025 AIG Women's Open
programme.desc: Watch the second round of the AIG Women's Open at Royal Porthcawl Golf Club in Porthcawl, Wales.

The 118 faces emergencies at a spin class and a hair salon; a husband and wife find themselves in a compromising position; Buck discovers new cognitive abilities; Hen and Karen find out Denny has been seeing his biological father.

The 118 race to emergencies at a commercial bakery and a bodybuilding competition; Bobby's annual performance reviews send Chimney to the firefighter academy, where he runs into a familiar face; Eddie's aunt gets involved in his personal life.

A fire breaks out in an accountant's office and a car crashes into a "living funeral"; Athena is shocked when a suspect dies in her custody minutes after she arrests him; Buck is attracted to a death doula; Maddie and Chimney are audited by the IRS.

The 118 race to rescue two roommates desperately trying to find a needle in a haystack at a landfill, and help a woman whose nightmare dream suddenly becomes a painful reality; Athena and Maddie team up to find a missing boy in a crowded mall.

A wedding proposal tragically intersects with a bank robbery; a bride is literally stuck on her way to the altar; Athena talks a victim through her grief; Buck finds a surprise visitor on his doorstep.
A series of freeway car accidents leads to a catastrophic overpass collapse that endangers the lives of civilians and members of the 118.

programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.
